00034 struct intrusive_stack_node
00035 {
00036         intrusive_stack_node * next;
00037         
00038         void insert(intrusive_stack_node * const p)
00039         {
00040                 p->next = next;
00041                 next = p;
00042         }
00043 };
00044 
00045 
00046 class intrusive_stack_base
00047 {
00048 protected:
00049         intrusive_stack_node impl;
00050         
00051         intrusive_stack_base()                                                  { clear(); }
00052 
00053         void clear()
00054         {
00055                 impl.next = & impl;
00056         }
00057 };

00068 class intrusive_stack : protected intrusive_stack_base
00069 {
00070         typedef intrusive_stack_base                                    base;
00071 
00072 public:
00073         typedef intrusive_stack_node                                    node;
00074         typedef intrusive_stack_node *                                  pointer;
00075         template <typename T, intrusive_stack_node T::* P> 
00076                 struct iterator;
00077 
00078 protected:
00079         using base::impl;
00080 
00081 public:
00082         pointer begin()                                                                 { return impl.next; }
00083         pointer end()                                                                   { return & impl; }
00084 
00085         bool empty() const                                                              { return impl.next == & impl; }
00086         
00087         void push(pointer i)
00088         {
00089                 end()->insert(i);
00090         }
00091 };
00092 
00093 
00094 template <typename T, intrusive_stack_node T::* P>
00095         struct intrusive_stack::iterator
00096         {
00097                 typedef iterator                                                        self_type;
00098                 typedef intrusive_stack_node                            node_type;
00099 
00100                 iterator() : node_()                                                    {}
00101                 iterator(intrusive_stack::pointer __x) : node_(__x) {}
00102 
00103                 T & operator * () const                                                 { return * roofof(P, node_); }
00104                 T * operator -> () const                                                { return roofof(P, node_); }
00105 
00106                 self_type & operator ++ ()
00107                 {
00108                         node_ = node_->next;
00109                         return * this;
00110                 }
00111 
00112                 bool operator == (const self_type & x) const    { return node_ == x.node_; }
00113                 bool operator != (const self_type & x) const    { return node_ != x.node_; }
00114 
00115                 node_type * node_;
00116         };
